summary: The module defines a protocol for objects that expose dimensionality information (axes count, shape tuple, element count) and a mixin that supplies standard shape properties and representation for any object storing a _shape attribute. It also includes lightweight utilities for converting inputs to shape tuples and flattening shape specifications.
business_intent: Enable Qiskit primitives to work uniformly with array-like data structures by providing a common interface and reusable shape handling logic, facilitating static type checking, runtime validation, and consistent representation of multidimensional data.
